org.kocakosm.pitaya.io

Class CharStreams

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kocakosm.pitaya.io.CharStreams

  • public final class CharStreams
extends Object
    Character streams utilities.
    Author:
    Osman KOCAK

    • Method Detail

      • concat

        public static Reader concat(Reader... streams)
        Concatenates the given Readers into a single one. The given streams will be read sequentially. Closing the concatenated stream will close all the source streams. Note that the returned Reader is not thread-safe and does not support Reader.mark(int) and Reader.reset().
        Parameters:
        streams - the streams to concatenate.
        Returns:
        the concatenated Reader.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if streams is null or if it contains a null reference.
        IllegalArgumentException - if streams is empty.

      • concat

        public static Reader concat(Iterable<? extends Reader> streams)
        Concatenates the given Readers into a single one. The given streams will be read sequentially. Closing the concatenated stream will close all the source streams. Note that the returned Reader is not thread-safe and does not support Reader.mark(int) and Reader.reset().
        Parameters:
        streams - the streams to concatenate.
        Returns:
        the concatenated Reader.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if streams is null or if it contains a null reference.
        IllegalArgumentException - if streams is empty.

      • copy

        public static void copy(Reader in,
                        Writer out)
                 throws IOException
        Copies the content of the given Reader into the given Writer.
        Parameters:
        in - the Reader to read from.
        out - the Reader to write on.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if one of the arguments is null.
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the process.

                        Writer out)
                 throws IOException

        out - the Reader to write on.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if one of the arguments is null.
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the process.

      • copy

                        Writer out,
                        Charset charset)
                 throws IOException
        Copies the content of the given InputStream into the given Writer using the specified charset.
        Parameters:
        in - the InputStream to read from.
        out - the Reader to write on.
        charset - the charset to use.
        Throws:

        IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the process.

      • equal

        public static boolean equal(Reader in1,
                            Reader in2)
                     throws IOException
        Returns whether the given streams have the same content.
        Parameters:
        in1 - the first stream.
        in2 - the second stream.
        Returns:
        true if the streams have the same content.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the process.

      • limit

        public static Reader limit(Reader in,
                           long limit)
        Returns an Reader that will only supply characters from the given Reader up to the specified limit. The returned Reader is thread-safe.
        Parameters:
        in - the source stream.
        limit - the maximum number of characters to be read from in.
        Returns:
        the length-limited Reader.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if in is null.
        IllegalArgumentException - if limit is negative.

      • read

        public static String read(Reader in)
                   throws IOException
        Reads the whole content of the given Reader into a String.
        Parameters:
        in - the stream to read.
        Returns:
        the stream's content as a String.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if in is null.
        IOException - if the stream cannot be read.

        Returns:

      • readLines

        public static List<String> readLines(Reader in)
                              throws IOException
        Reads all the lines from the given source Reader. Note that the returned List is immutable.
        Parameters:
        in - the stream to read.
        Returns:
        the stream's lines.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if in is null.
        IOException - if the stream cannot be read.

      • tee

        public static Writer tee(Writer... streams)
        Returns a Writer that writes all characters written to it to the given underlying streams. Named after the Unix 'tee' command. The returned instance is not thread-safe.
        Parameters:
        streams - the streams to write to.
        Returns:
        the 'tee' Writer.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if streams is null or if it contains a null reference.

      • tee

        public static Writer tee(Iterable<? extends Writer> streams)
        Returns a Writer that writes all characters written to it to the given underlying streams. Named after the Unix 'tee' command. The returned instance is not thread-safe.
        Parameters:
        streams - the streams to write to.
        Returns:
        the 'tee' Writer.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if streams is null or if it contains a null reference.
